verses.name: Isaiah 14:26
verses.text: This is the purpose that is purposed upon the whole earth: and this is the hand that is stretched out upon all the nations.

verses.name: Isaiah 14:27
verses.text: For the Lord of hosts hath purposed, and who shall disannul it? and his hand is stretched out, and who shall turn it back?

verses.name: Isaiah 14:28
verses.text: In the year that king Ahaz died was this burden.

verses.name: Isaiah 14:29
verses.text: Rejoice not thou, whole Palestina, because the rod of him that smote thee is broken: for out of the serpent’s root shall come forth a cockatrice, and his fruit shall be a fiery flying serpent.
